name: Project_PerfectDemise
description:
Hi. I'm C_Hex, but you can call me C. 

     This is Project_PerfectDemise, a project I made in a few days. It's my first game ever, and I just wanted to see how people might like it. I'm unsure if I will continue forward with this, or if this is just a one-time thing. Regardless, I hope you all enjoy this for what it is! 

     If you're wondering what this is about, I personally think it's best to go in blind, but before you do, I do have some warnings.

     The game does have bright colors and high contrast images. In addition, there are hints of abduction, missing people, dark themes, etc. I just want to put that here in case of anything. 

     If you're wanting more information on what the game is about, all I can say is that this game is weird. You play as Peter, and you play him while he's having a conversation with Dr. Heart. 

That's all I can really say. 

If you like this and want me to continue, let me know! Same goes for general feedback, or anything you think I should change. Also let me know if you run into any problems or errors. I'm here to help! 

That's all I have to say for now. I hope you all enjoy this for what it is. Who knows, maybe there will be a version 0.1 someday! 

Be safe and happy everyone! See you around!

 :}
